sub_topic: Prove that the Cartesian product of two sets is not commutative with respect to union.
message_1:
Let A = {1, 2, 3} and B = {4, 5}.
Find the following sets: 
(AxB) U (BxA) and 
(BxA) U (AxB) 
and prove that they are not equal using the fact that the Cartesian product of two sets is not commutative with respect to union.
